name: Supercharged Previews
description: This style dramatically simplifies and improves the image thumbnails in DeviantArt's notification center, an area of the site that hasn't been getting a lot of love from DA themselves. Focus on much bigger thumbnails and ease of use.
additional_info:
Features:
  • Thumbnails cover the entire preview area
  • Entire image (not filled, but contained in preview area) is revealed on hover
  • Title and author revealed on hover
  • The additional actions drop down has been hidden in favor of a much larger, easier to click remove button
All in all, these changes made DeviantArt's desktop interface much more touchscreen friendly for me.
